permafrost.tundra.math

Class BigDecimalHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.math.BigDecimalHelper

  • public final class BigDecimalHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with decimals.

                                          java.math.RoundingMode roundingMode)
        Divides the given dividend by the divisor.
        Parameters:
        dividend - The decimal to be divided.
        divisor - The decimal to divide by.
        precision - The number of decimal places preserved in the result.
        roundingMode - The rounding algorithm to use when rounding the result.
        Returns:
        The result of dividing the dividend by the divisor.

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String decimal,
                               boolean raise)
                        throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if the given string can be parsed as a decimal number.
        Parameters:
        decimal - The string to validate.
        raise - True if an exception should be thrown if the string is not a valid decimal number.
        Returns:
        True if the string can be parsed as a decimal number, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the given string is not a valid decimal number.

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String decimal,
                               java.lang.String decimalPattern,
                               boolean raise)
                        throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if the given string can be parsed as a decimal number.
        Parameters:
        decimal - The string to validate.
        decimalPattern - A java.text.DecimalFormat pattern string describing the format of the given decimal string.
        raise - True if an exception should be thrown if the string is not a valid decimal number.
        Returns:
        True if the string can be parsed as a decimal number, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the given string is not a valid decimal number.

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String decimal,
                               java.util.Locale locale,
                               boolean raise)
                        throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if the given string can be parsed as a decimal number.
        Parameters:
        decimal - The string to validate.
        raise - True if an exception should be thrown if the string is not a valid decimal number.
        locale - The locale to use if the string is only parseable in this localized format.
        Returns:
        True if the string can be parsed as a decimal number, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the given string is not a valid decimal number.

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(java.math.BigDecimal... decimals)
        Returns true if all given decimals are equal, ignoring scale.
        Parameters:
        decimals - The decimals to compare.
        Returns:
        True if all given decimals are equal, ignoring scale.

      • isZero

        public static boolean isZero(java.math.BigDecimal decimal)
        Returns true if the given decimal is equal to zero, ignoring scale.
        Parameters:
        decimal - The decimal to compare to zero.
        Returns:
        True if the given decimal is equal to zero, ignoring scale.
